DOC.brief_summary: This is a randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, 16-week study designed to evaluate the hypothesis that tissue-resident herpes virus may be causally related to fibromyalgia symptoms or recurrence. IMC-1 is a combination treatment that is designed to suppress this suspected virus and thus alleviate fibromyalgia symptoms.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of IMC-1 In Patients With Fibromyalgia
